stepTitle: Understanding the Keyboard PCB (Printed Circuit Board)
instructions: This is where your the heart of your Matchbox comes from - an old recycled keyboard!
note: We source these old keyboards from computer labs in our university!

stepTitle: Understanding the Keyboard PCB (Printed Circuit Board)
instructions: First we unscrew the screws on the back of the old keyboard to remove the keyboard PCB from the case.
note: The disassembly has been done for you already, but we think it is important to start from the beginning to get a good intuition of how the Matchbox works.

instructions: Make sure the Main PCB is sitting flat on the bottom shell.
check: Look at your assembly from the side. There should be no gap between the Main PCB and the bottom shell
error: If you notice a gap, please revisit step 10 and double check the alignment.
